mapper.insert: insert into t_eye ( user_id, type, owner_id, owner_name, owner_tel, owner_age, owner_height, eye_id, remark ) values ( #{userId}, #{type}, #{ownerId}, #{ownerName}, #{ownerTel}, #{ownerAge}, #{ownerHeight}, #{eyeId}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update t_eye set type=#{type}, owner_id=#{ownerId}, owner_name=#{ownerName}, owner_tel=#{ownerTel}, owner_age=#{ownerAge}, owner_height=#{ownerHeight}, remark=#{remark} where eye_id=#{eyeId}
mapper.select: select * from t_eye where user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc limit 2
